definitions.definition: A type of government where absolute sovereignty is allotted to an individual or a small clique .
A government which exercises autocratic rule.
examples: There were no elections during Franco's dictatorship .

definitions.definition: Any household , institution , or other organization that is run under such sovereignty or autocracy.

main_definition: A type of government where absolute sovereignty is allotted to an individual or a small clique .
secondary_definitions: A government which exercises autocratic rule.
Any household , institution , or other organization that is run under such sovereignty or autocracy.
